PerfectNetExp.abs: 花脸苣苔（kohleria）（Kohleria），原名科罗拉多苦苣苔（Kohleria SP. ），别名艳斑苦苣苔、花猫、角桐草。苦苣苔科花脸苣苔（kohleria）属。
Blog | 香蕉仔 Dickson Blog - Yahoo! Blog ... Gesneriad 苦苣苔, Kohleria 艳斑苣苔 Episcia 喜荫花.

means.word_mean: 1. shrubby herb cultivated for their soft velvety foliage and showy scarlet flowers
